src:
Kate Middleton tem sido o grande apoio de Meghan Markle
01 Nov 2019, 19:21 by Ana Pereira

O clima de crispação entre os duques de Sussex e a imprensa é cada vez maior com as declarações de Meghan Markle no documentário ‘Harry & Meghan: An African Journey’, da ITV News, a marcarem a agenda mediática em torno do casal.

Agora, sabe-se que a duquesa de Sussex tem contado com o apoio de Kate Middleton, a mulher de William. De acordo com Phil Kate, especialista em assuntos reais, as duas têm falado bastante por telefone. “Disseram-me que tem estado em contacto com a Meghan e falado com ela ao telefone. A Kate sente pena dela e sabe aquilo por que Meghan está a passar”, garantiu.
O especialista garante também ao Daily Mail que Kate está determinada em conciliar os dois casais, mas sobretudo William e Harry.
RELACIONADAS


Meghan Markle ou Kate Middleton? Conheça a preferência da rainha Isabel II


Meghan Markle e Kate Middleton juntas para assistirem a jogo de polo com os filhos


Fotografias de Meghan Markle com Kate Middleton foram planeadas


Fãs não perdoam mensagem enviada por Kate Middleton e William a Meghan Markle


“Nos bastidores disseram-me que a Kate está a fazer o seu melhor para juntar toda a gente e ajudar a Meghan. Nenhum deles quer desapontar a rainha, por isso a Kate está a tentar resolver as coisas em privado”, concluiu.
text:
Kate Middleton has been the great support of Meghan Markle
01 Nov 2019, 19:21 by Ana Pereira

The mood of friction between the Dukes of Sussex and the press is growing with the statements by Meghan Markle in ITV News documentary Harry & Meghan: An African Journey marking the media agenda around the couple.

It is now known that the Duchess of Sussex has had the support of William Middleton, William's wife. According to real-world expert Phil Kate, the two have been talking a lot over the phone. “They tell me you have been in contact with Meghan and talking to her on the phone. Kate feels sorry for her and knows what Meghan is going through, ”he said.
The expert also assures the Daily Mail that Kate is determined to reconcile the two couples, but above all William and Harry.
RELATED


Meghan Markle or Kate Middleton? Meet Queen Elizabeth II's preference


Meghan Markle and Kate Middleton together to watch polo game with their kids


Meghan Markle photographs with Kate Middleton were planned


Fans don't forgive message sent by Kate Middleton and William to Meghan Markle


“Behind the scenes I was told that Kate is doing her best to get everyone together and help Meghan. None of them want to disappoint the queen, so Kate is trying to work things out in private, ”he concluded.
